title: How to Use a Do‐217 Effectively in War Thunder

methods.name: Using the Do-217 as a Heavy Fighter

steps.headline: Spawn the Do-217 first, is you are playing in Arcade difficulty.
steps.description: If it is Realistic, it does not matter, because you only get one aircraft. Please never, ever use a Do-217 in Simulator difficulty. This step will become apparent later.

steps.headline: Adjust your altitude so that it is similar to one of the enemy aircraft.
steps.description: You should also do this as soon as the enemy aircraft is spotted, because the Do-217 does not climb well. The enemy aircraft you have chosen also has to be heading somewhat straight at you, and is preferably a fighter.

steps.headline: When the enemy aircraft is about 0.7 km away, fire straight at the enemy's fuselage and/or cockpit.
Use the Do-217 as an attack aircraft, satisfied that you have one air kill.
steps.description: Or, you can try your luck going head on against another enemy aircraft, but it is not guaranteed to work.

methods.name: Using the Do-217 as a Ground Attack Aircraft

steps.headline: Decide on the enemy ground target when you are still far away from it.
steps.description: This will give you time to maneuver towards it.

steps.headline: Enter a shallow dive.
steps.description: This will let you pull out of it easily once you have destroyed it.

steps.headline: When your aiming circle turns red, fire to the best of your ability.
Repeat until you have destroyed all the ground units of the enemy.

methods.name: Using the Do-217 as a Bomber

steps.headline: Climb, and if possible, ask for fighter support.
steps.description: This will help to protect you from enemy fighters.

steps.headline: Use the bomb sight camera to bomb; Do not dive bomb at any cost.

text: Using the Do-217 as a Heavy Fighter Spawn the Do-217 first, is you are playing in Arcade difficulty. If it is Realistic, it does not matter, because you only get one aircraft. Please never, ever use a Do-217 in Simulator difficulty. This step will become apparent later. Adjust your altitude so that it is similar to one of the enemy aircraft. You should also do this as soon as the enemy aircraft is spotted, because the Do-217 does not climb well. The enemy aircraft you have chosen also has to be heading somewhat straight at you, and is preferably a fighter. When the enemy aircraft is about 0.7 km away, fire straight at the enemy's fuselage and/or cockpit.  Use the Do-217 as an attack aircraft, satisfied that you have one air kill. Or, you can try your luck going head on against another enemy aircraft, but it is not guaranteed to work. Using the Do-217 as a Ground Attack Aircraft Decide on the enemy ground target when you are still far away from it. This will give you time to maneuver towards it. Enter a shallow dive. This will let you pull out of it easily once you have destroyed it. When your aiming circle turns red, fire to the best of your ability.  Repeat until you have destroyed all the ground units of the enemy.  Using the Do-217 as a Bomber Climb, and if possible, ask for fighter support. This will help to protect you from enemy fighters. Use the bomb sight camera to bomb; Do not dive bomb at any cost.
